subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Tom Boonen of Belgium won a sprint finish yesterday to capture the first stage of the Tour de Suisse, a tuneup for next month's Tour de France. Boonen held off Daniele Bennati of Italy and Oscar Freire of Spain in the 96-mile stage, which started and ended in Baden.
